HTMLQuestion.HTMLContent:
See the profile and tweets below and select how trustworthy profile and user behind it is.

Very Trustworthy Profile is Very Trustworthy

Profile is between Trustworthy and Very Trustworthy

Trustworthy Profile is Trustworthy

Profile is between Somewhat Trustworthy and Trustworthy

Somewhat Trustworthy: Profile is Somewhat Trustworthy

Somewhat Untrustworthy: Profile is Somewhat Untrustworthy

: Profile is between Somewhat Untrustworthy and Untrustworthy

Untrustworthy: Profile is Untrustworthy

: Profile is between Untrustworthy and Very Untrustworthy

Very Untrustworthy: Profile is Very Untrustworthy

 Choose level how much you trust twitter profile
